pullRequest.title: Support rocks DBs in EVMTool
pullRequest.bodyText:
Allows the DB of a stopped node to be used for benchmarking.
Signed-off-by: Danno Ferrin danno.ferrin@gmail.com

commit.message:
Support rocks DBs in EVMTool

Allows the DB of a stopped node to be used for benchmarking.

Signed-off-by: Danno Ferrin <danno.ferrin@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText: Does this need to be a supplier? I think the db is only created when you call create
